thread.title: Spagna colloca 4,01 mld euro titoli 6 e 12 mesi, tassi in calo Bond |

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Spagna colloca 4,01 mld euro titoli 6 e 12 mesi, tassi in calo Bond |
text: ) - MADRID, February 13 (Reuters) - Spain announced the following results at Tuesday's Treasury bill auction . (Amounts bid, allocated in millions of euros) ISSUE YIELD PREVIOUS PRICE PREVIOUS BID ALLOCATED 6-month -0.472 -0.459 100.240 100.224 2,538 575 12-month -0.419 -0.402 100.426 100.409 6,057 3,431 The bid-to-cover ratio on the 6-month bill was 4.4 versus 4.7 at the last auction. The bid-to-cover ratio on the 12-month bill was 1.8 versus 1.7 at the last auction. For further information, click on and . (Reporting by Madrid Newsroom) Keywords: SPAIN DEBT/
